alert.note: Alert for Stevens (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Stevens County through 1030 PM CDT... At 940 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Herman, or 13 miles east of Wheaton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Donnelly around 955 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Morris. This includes U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 164 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
